start: Hi, if you want to play tic tac toe write /tttgame
main:
This is a tic-tac-toe field
To put a cross or a zero, just click on the button and its state will change
Good luck
irrelevant_field: Please play on the current field
draw:
Draw ⚔️
Lucky next time
Let's play one more timed, write /tttgame
occupied_cell:
This cell is already occupied
Select another cell
win_cross:
Congratulations to 🔥❌🔥 he is the winner 🎉
Player 2 don't be upset and ask for a rematch by writing /tttgame
win_zero:
Congratulations to 🔥⭕🔥 he is the winner 🎉
Player 1 don't be upset and ask for a rematch by writing /tttgame
unfinished:
Please finish playing the game or finish it by writing 
/stopgame
norungame:
No game running
Try to write /tttgame to play tic tac toe
invalid_opponent:
The opponent's nickname was entered incorrectly
Check that the data is correct and try again
